questions.question: If a friend cancels plans?
options: No worries, I love staying home
Send a meme and move on

questions.question: Which emoji do you use most?
Which SNS do you use most?

results.title: Bengal Tiger
results.desc: A natural leader who controls emotions freely! You energize and lead everyone.
results.recommend: Post your FLEX meme on your Insta story today!
results.tmi: TMI: Even tigers sometimes just wanna chill at home lol
results.mz_dialog: "Is this for real? I'm totally a tiger!"

results.title: Moon Bear
results.desc: Warm-hearted and broad-minded! You spread comfort to everyone around you.
results.recommend: Share a nap meme with your friends!
results.share_phrase: I got Bear lol, today is stay-home day #AnimalFate
results.tmi: TMI: Bears hibernate, and so do I. Sleep is life.
results.mz_dialog: "This is so me lol, home is the best!"

results.title: Hedgehog
results.desc: Spiky on the outside, but warm on the inside! You open up to those close to you.
results.tmi: TMI: Spiky outside, but actually super soft-hearted.

results.title: Black Panther
results.desc: Instinctive yet rational, chic and full of charm!
results.recommend: Surprise your friend with a cool meme today!
results.tmi: TMI: Looks chic, but actually warm inside.

results.title: Arctic Fox
results.desc: You seem cold, but you’re actually a sensitive soul!
results.recommend: Flood the comments with fox emojis!
results.share_phrase: Got Arctic Fox lol, certified sensitive #AnimalFate
results.tmi: TMI: Foxes sometimes get emotional too.
results.mz_dialog: "Cold on the outside, soft on the inside~"

results.title: Pink Dolphin
results.desc: A romantic swimming in the sea of emotions! You spread positive vibes to friends.
results.recommend: DM your friends a wholesome meme today!
results.share_phrase: Got Pink Dolphin lol, feeling all the feels #AnimalFate
results.tmi: TMI: Dolphins actually laugh out loud.

results.title: Bluebird
results.desc: A free spirit who brings a swirl of emotions! You always catch the spotlight.
results.recommend: Post a bluebird meme to your story!
results.tmi: TMI: Bluebirds are actually great singers.

results.title: Unicorn
results.desc: A limitless imagination and the ultimate healing icon for everyone!
results.recommend: Chat with friends using unicorn emojis!
results.tmi: TMI: Unicorns actually heal people (in our hearts).
results.mz_dialog: "Is this for real? I'm a healing unicorn!"
